title: [BUG] Resize changes the orientation of some images automatically which is undesirable
body:
**Description**

We're using SkiaSharp to resize our images. For most images, it works just fine. But for some images it rotates them in addition to resizing them, which is undesirable. The rotation is automatic.

**Code**

Code is long. I have attached an image that has this problem.

**Expected Behavior**

It should resize images, without automatically rotating them.

**Actual Behavior**

It resizes images, and for some images it automatically rotates them too.

Since it happens for all version on all operating systems (we have tested Windows and Linux), thus we just provide one image that has this problem. Please test this image.

![random](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/81751123/194540687-d2b259c9-a53f-4079-a70a-754198de8ef9.jpeg)
